sets.tps: 200 HP, 4 En, 40 M Def, 200 R Def, 56 Sp
sets.detail:
200 HP and 200 Ranged Defense with Clever are to be as bulky as possible 
 56 Speed outspeeds 0 Speed Phagenaut 
 4 Energy = 250 Energy at level 50 for (1 Fire Breath + 1 Shrewd Blast + 5 Peace of Minds) with Heavy Shield 
 4 Energy = 250 Energy at level 50 for (6 Fire Breaths + 1 Peace of Mind) with Energy Orb 
 40 Melee Defense is leftovers and improves bulk a little
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer
